title: Nimrod
contents: Nimrod is a god the size of a galaxy with the body of a sasquatch and the head of a chupacabra.

title: Lucifina
contents: Lucifina is the goddess of the Suckverse, and stands for many things, a few of which are female empowerment and badassitude, beauty, and punishment of the wicked.

title: Triple M
contents: Micheal Motherfuckin' McDonald is the bard of the Suck, and his voice could tame the fiercest dragon.
